result.markdown: --- title: Computational Notebooks author: - name: Von P. Walden email: v.walden@wsu.edu affiliations: - Washington State University date: last-modified jupyter: python3 --- ## Introduction ![](ce401.png) Â© Von P. Walden, Washington State University These computational notebooks were developed by Von P. Walden at Washington State University as part of the course CE401 - Climate Change Science and Engineering. Some of the notebooks are closely associated with Andrew Dessler's book, *Introduction to Modern Climate Change*, and are designed to provide engineering students with more background in how to calculate parameters that are related to Earth's climate and climate change.
